mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, d.dept_name AS deptName, r.rank_name AS rankName, u.user_email AS userEmail, u.user_status AS userStatus FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN `dept` d ON u.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN `ranks` r ON u.rank_id = r.rank_id WHERE u.user_status = 'ACTIVE' AND u.user_id NOT IN ( SELECT sp.user_id FROM schedule_participant sp WHERE sp.schedule_id = #{scheduleId} AND sp.role = 'OWNER' )
